Title: Requires discrimination, bias, and harassment prevention training for members of state boards and commissions
Summary: Requires discrimination, bias, and harassment prevention training for members of state boards and commissions; requires the division of human rights to develop a model bias and discrimination prevention training program.
LawCode: Add ยง170-f, amd ยง295, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to requiring discrimination, bias, and harassment prevention training for members of state boards and commissions
